title: Thug For Hire: A NEW ADULT NOVEL.
description: EXPLOSIVE – DANGEROUS – SPINE CHILLINGSuffocating under the impossible expectations of her cruel, iron fisted parents, while struggling to deal with an abusive past, Adeline Masters has no other choice but to abide by their rules. Suffering in silence until she can escape to college, she unexpectedly meets the charming Lucas Peterson. The savior she is secretly desperate for thrusts her into a chilling, dangerous game of deceit riddled with skeletons, leaving Adeline at the leniency of a 'Thug For Hire' who has no mercy left to give.Crude, obnoxious and uncaring, Andrew 'Ajax' Jackson is one of the youngest criminal masterminds of the underworld, getting exactly what he wants, when he wants it. Without a past for an anchor and a bleak existence for a future, he understands only one thing; survival. Ajax has no time or compassion for humanity, much less the damaged girl he has kidnapped and yet...  (Warning: This book contains violence, abuse, profanity and graphic sexual scenes.)
author: Kylie Gray
